personal.name: Muhammad Umer
personal.title: iOS Developer
personal.bio: Creative iOS Developer skilled in Swift and modern development tools. Adept at transforming complex ideas into intuitive, high-performance mobile apps. Passionate about leveraging innovative technologies to deliver exceptional user experiences.

projects.name: Phone Cleaner
projects.description: Comprehensive Phone Cleaner app with intelligent photo grouping using Vision, secure secret library, charging animation intents, contact management, and efficient video compression.
projects.longDescription: Developed a comprehensive Phone Cleaner app with intelligent photo grouping using Vision framework for photo similarity detection. Features include a secure secret library, charging animation intents, contact management, and efficient video compression. Implemented optimized caching, background processing, and smooth user experience across all modules.

projects.name: Voice Recorder
projects.description: Full-featured Voice Recorder app with high-quality recording, multiple modes, tag management, audio trimming, transcription, and Core Data caching.
projects.longDescription: Independently developed and published a Voice Recorder app featuring high-quality audio recording with multiple modes, comprehensive tag management, audio trimming capabilities, transcription features, and Core Data caching for offline access. Integrated Firebase Crashlytics for real-time issue tracking and monitoring.

projects.name: VidInsight Video Player
projects.description: Feature-rich video player with Google Ads integration, Android TV casting via Google Cast SDK, and seamless playback experience.
projects.longDescription: Developed and integrated Google Ads for optimized ad display, including interstitial and app open ads. Implemented Android TV screen casting using the Google Cast SDK. Managed ad configurations via Firebase Remote Config, monitored performance with Firebase Analytics and Crashlytics, and enhanced video playback features and local network connectivity to deliver a seamless and user-friendly video player experience.

projects.name: Soha
projects.description: E-commerce app with LeonardoAI prompt generation and three customizable themes for an engaging shopping experience.
projects.longDescription: Independently developed the Soha e-commerce app, leveraging LeonardoAI for prompt generation and implementing three customizable themes for an engaging user experience. Managed the entire development process from concept to deployment.

projects.name: TutorBuzz
projects.description: Educational platform connecting tutors with students for seamless learning experiences.

projects.name: Yunrii
projects.description: E-commerce application with modern shopping features and intuitive user interface.

projects.name: HSSReport
projects.description: Reporting and analytics application for health and safety management.

projects.name: Task Management
projects.description: Productivity app for organizing tasks and boosting efficiency.

achievements: Integrated Google Ads and Android TV casting with Google Cast SDK, enhancing user engagement by 20%
Optimized ad placement via Firebase Remote Config and monitored performance using Firebase Analytics
Sole developer responsible for the end-to-end development of an iOS app, ensuring high-quality delivery
Integrated Firebase/Firestore for real-time data syncing and improved app functionality
Collaborated with Android teams to maintain cross-platform consistency
Utilized RxSwift for responsive data handling and seamless user experiences
Worked remotely with a dynamic company, demonstrating strong self-management and communication skills
Designed and developed UI screens for multiple client apps, ensuring smooth user flows and consistent design patterns
Integrated REST APIs across various modules, including authentication, dashboards, chat features, and data syncing
Implemented Firebase services such as Firestore, Authentication, and Cloud Messaging for real-time features and notifications
Collaborated with backend teams to refine API structures and improve app performance and reliability
